# Administrator Guide

Welcome to the Dummy Inc product suite administrator guide. This comprehensive resource will help you configure and manage all aspects of your Dummy Inc software deployment.

## Overview

The administrator guide is divided into several key sections:

- **[SmartWidget Pro](smartwidget/overview.qmd)** - Inventory management and retail operations control panel
- **[CRM Connect](crm/overview.qmd)** - Customer relationship management system configuration
- **[Integration APIs](integrations/api_guide.qmd)** - Connect your existing systems with Dummy Inc products

Use the sidebar navigation to explore each section in detail.
